title: Alcatel PIXI 4 (8063) 1 GB RAM 8 GB ROM 7 inch with Wi-Fi Only Tablet (Smokey Grey)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Battery, AC Power Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Bigger and Better: Watching movies, playing games, working on your presentations and everything else will turn out to be better on the Alcatel PIXI 4, thanks to its 17.78 cm (7) screen.
product_description.Performance: Shop while you work, switch between multiple tabs, and do much more without experience any lag on this tablet. Powered by a 1.3 GHz quad-core processor and 1 GB RAM, this tablet offers a glitch-free experience while its dust- and -splash-proof design makes it sturdy and durable.
product_description.Travel Buddy: You can carry this thin and lightweight tablet with you anywhere you go. What's more, you can capture beautiful pictures and videos of the place you're holidaying at with its 2 MP rear camera. And with its 0.3 MP front camera, you can video call your loved ones from anywhere and everywhere using your an active internet connection.
product_description.Store Memories: Store all that you want - pictures, music, office documents and everything else without worrying about running out of storage space as this tablet comes with 8 GB internal memory.
product_description.Stay Fueled Up: Powered by a 2580 mAh battery, this Android tablet keeps you going all day long.

review:
Looks and build quality:
The tab looks good and the build quality is sturdy and excellent!
It will look even better in white colour option(personal opinion)
---------------------------
Battery backup:
For the battery capacity the battery backup is quite good.
---------------------------
Display:
Display resoultion is poor but touch sensitivity is excellent!
---------------------------
Audio quality:
The audio quality is good both in speaker and earphones.
---------------------------
Storage:
Internal storage 8gb.(you can also make your external sd card as internal memory).
---------------------------
Perfomance:
Perfomance is excellent!(thanks to the low resolution display).
Asphalt 8 runs smoothly in high graphics.No framedrops.
---------------------------
Verdict:
Overall a best buy for the price!
I got for 4k
---------------------------
What's in the box?
Charger,Documentation,screen protector(already installed plus 1 inside the box),data cable and the tablet itself.

My rating:*****(5 star)

Alcatel PIXI 4 (7) Wifi tablet is good. It functions very well. Processor speed is good. The company provides screen guard with the tablet. Once it is sticked with the guard. The tablet screen looks normal. HD videos play very much good on it. The tablet is thinner and smaller comparing to same range tabets by other brands. The cons of the tablet is that its cover is not available in the market.

Good device under Rs/-5000.
The processing power is enough to play medium games and we can also play Full high definition videos.
Ram management is good. Since we can open multiple normal applications simultaneously.
Camera is not good in this device.
Screen clarity is normal becauseIt resolution is not Full HD.
Best in budget an awesome tablet for its price good screen brightness is good a must buy tablet thanks Alcatel and flipkart.

If you are thinking about to buy this product for moderate use go ahead it's a good product no heating issues works fine UI is lightweight and screen quality is alright I bought this product for 3000₹ it plays video well without hanging up considering the ram very low for it standards again it does what it need to do browsing is fine however don't buy this product for gaming this is not a product for gaming

It's really worthy for the price. Can't ask much for that price.. screen is little glary and often see our reflection.. screen brightness is not so great and pixels could have been better.. overall experience for budget tablet is satisfactory

I wanted to buy a budget tablet from a standard company so i selected Alcatel.I got it on 18th of july .The delivery by flipkart was very prompt and i am fully satisfied with the product.The touch functions very well...better than i expected in a tab worth 4k,the screen resolution is also not bad.We shd put aside the cameras in this one.The sound output is also quite ordinary, Overall the product is quite decent and working without any glitches. It is a good one to give into the hands of children also because it dosent have a sim -just stop the data usage and no radiation.secondly it is not expensive.I loaded photos and videos taken with a DSLR camera which are opening very smoothly. Only one difference i found is that the inbuilt memory is only 4gb whereas on flipkart it was stated as 8gb.
Great Product and a clear winner for this price point! Will surely recommend if they maintain the discounts :) Keep up alcatel!

For a product that costs less than ₹4000 , this is a wonderful deal. The touch screen sensitivity is manageable and it's been 2 days since the day of purchase ,the device is yet to lag. It is perfect for watching videos and stuff, low weight games and reading. If you need a low to mediocre usage device, go for it.
Best tab under 4000 rs but the battery should have some power so we do not need to charge 2 or 3 times a day but it is the best tab in this price range. But its very good in RAM optimizing.Good✌.

Review after 1 week:
Battery very poor.
Even in sleep mode it consumes a lot of battery.
Using it for last 2 days. Can't complain anything at this price. Very basic one, light and handy. Screen could have been slightly better with ambient sensor for brightness adjustment.
Display of this device is very bad ,you can not view properly even from the front side.eye spoiler.....
It came earlier and it was looking good nice tab at this price

Pros:
1) 7'' Display,
2) Light Weight,
3) Good Battery,
4) Comes in Budget.

Cons:
1) Only one sided Display, can't possible for any side display,
2) Battery charges very Slowly, Output Voltage is lesser than 1A.

Final Words: I think we can not expect more in Rs.4000/-. Good for watching Videos. Okay to Buy.
Thank You.

answers: A:Alcatel pixi 4 has two variants which has cost approx 3000 and 7000. only 7000 cost tablet support otg. 3000 cost not.
A:I am having one but that is used one.I can give if you want ?
A:This is an android tablet. you can install any android app on it including whatsap, Facebook
A:It's a WiFi tablet which is having 3G connectivity.
A:Tab is good. Everything is expected. only problem is lack of sim. otherwise good product. And also service centre available at my location.
A:No, it does not supports usb otg.
A:No Phone/Tab supports .mkv format videos. You need to download a video player from playstore to play the video.
A:it not that heavy its light weight , though i am not having weighing scale or would give you accurate weight of the tablet , thanks go ahead and purchase its not heavy
